abstract: Creates a render stage from a raw value.
overview:
## Discussion

Use of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages] type’s static properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages/mesh], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages/vertex], or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages/fragment] instead of creating a render stage instance yourself with this initializer.

# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a render stage from a raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: A bit field value of a render stage as an integer.

## Discussion

Use of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages] type’s static properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages/mesh], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages/vertex], or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderStages/fragment] instead of creating a render stage instance yourself with this initializer.
title: init(rawValue:)
